burlap.behavior.policy

Interface SolverDerivedPolicy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoltzmannQPolicy, DDPlannerPolicy, EpsilonGreedy, GreedyDeterministicQPolicy, GreedyQPolicy, SDPlannerPolicy, UCTTreeWalkPolicy

    public interface SolverDerivedPolicy
    An interface for defining policies that refer to a MDPSolverInterface objects to defined the policy. For example, selecting actions based on the maximum Q-value that a solver computed.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setSolver(MDPSolverInterface solver)
      Sets the valueFunction whose results affect this policy.

    • Method Detail

      • setSolver

        void setSolver(MDPSolverInterface solver)
        Sets the valueFunction whose results affect this policy.
        Parameters:
        solver - the solver from which this policy is derived
